CheckCertificate.document: This API is used to verify a certificate.

CreateApplicationProxy.document: This API is used to create an application proxy.

CreateApplicationProxyRule.document: This API is used to create an application proxy rule.
CreateApplicationProxyRule.name: Creates an application proxy rule

CreateApplicationProxyRules.document: This API is used to batch create application proxy rules.
CreateApplicationProxyRules.name: Batch creates application proxy rules

CreateDnsRecord.document: This API is used to create a DNS record.

CreateLoadBalancing.document: This API is used to create a CLB instance.

CreatePrefetchTask.document: This API is used to create a pre-warming task.

CreatePurgeTask.document: This API is used to create a cache purging task.
CreatePurgeTask.name: Creates a cache purging task

CreateZone.document: This API is used to access a new site.
CreateZone.name: Creates a site

DeleteApplicationProxy.document: This API is used to delete an application proxy.
DeleteApplicationProxy.name: Deletes an application proxy

DeleteApplicationProxyRule.document: This API is used to delete an application proxy rule.
DeleteApplicationProxyRule.name: Deletes an application proxy rule

DeleteDnsRecords.document: This API is used to batch delete DNS records.
DeleteDnsRecords.name: Batch deletes DNS records

DeleteLoadBalancing.document: This API is used to delete a CLB instance.
DeleteLoadBalancing.name: Deletes a CLB instance

DeleteZone.document: This API is used to delete a site.

DescribeApplicationProxy.document: This API is used to obtain a list of application proxies.

DescribeApplicationProxyDetail.document: This API is used to obtain the details of an application proxy.
DescribeApplicationProxyDetail.name: Obtains the details of an application proxy

DescribeCnameStatus.document: This API is used to query the CNAME status of a domain name.
DescribeCnameStatus.name: Queries the CNAME status of a domain name

DescribeDefaultCertificates.document: This API is used to query a list of default certificates.
DescribeDefaultCertificates.name: Queries a list of default certificates

DescribeDnsData.document: This API is used to obtain collected DNS requests.
DescribeDnsData.name: Obtains collected DNS requests

DescribeDnsRecords.document: This API is used to query DNS records. Paging, sorting and filtering are supported.
DescribeDnsRecords.name: Queries DNS records

DescribeDnssec.document: This API is used to query DNSSEC information.
DescribeDnssec.name: Queries DNSSEC information

DescribeHostsCertificate.document: This API is used to query certificates of domain names. Paging, sorting and filtering are supported.
DescribeHostsCertificate.name: Queries certificates of domain names

DescribeHostsSetting.document: This API is used to query detailed domain name configuration.
DescribeHostsSetting.name: Queries detailed domain name configuration

DescribeIdentification.document: This API is used to query verification results.
DescribeIdentification.name: Queries verification results

DescribeLoadBalancing.document: This API is used to obtain a list of CLB instances.

DescribePrefetchTasks.document: This API is used to query the pre-warming task status.
DescribePrefetchTasks.name: Queries the pre-warming task status

DescribePurgeTasks.document: This API is used to query the cache purging history.

DescribeZoneDetails.document: This API is used to query the details of a site by site ID.

DescribeZones.document: This API is used to query the list of user sites.

members.document:
Origin server type. Valid values:
`custom`: Specified origins
`origins`: An origin group
`load_balancing`: A load balancer

members.document:
Origin server information.
When `OriginType=custom`, this field value indicates multiple origin servers in either of the following formats:
IP:Port
Domain name:Port
When `OriginType=origins`, it indicates the origin group ID.

Status:

`stopping`: Disabling
`fail`: Deployment/Disabling failed
members.name: Status

members.document:
Passes the client IP. When `Proto=TCP`, valid values:
`TOA`: Pass the client IP via TOA
`PPV1`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V1
`PPV2`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V2
`OFF`: Do not pass the client IP.
When `Proto=UDP`, valid values:
`PPV2`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V2
`OFF`: Do not pass the client IP.
members.name: ForwardClientIp

members.document: Specifies whether to enable session persistence

Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

Unit: second. The maximum value is 365 days.

Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

`on`: Do not cache
`off`: Cache
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

members.document:
Specifies whether to enable full-path cache
`on`: Enable full-path cache (i.e., disable Ignore Query String)
`off`: Disable full-path cache (i.e., enable Ignore Query String)
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.

members.document:
Filters by the field name. Values:
 - `host`: Domain name
 - `certId`: Certificate ID
 - `certAlias`: Certificate alias
 - `certType: default`: Default certificate; `upload`: External certificate; `managed`: Tencent Cloud certificate.
members.name: Name

members.document:
Specifies whether to enable fuzzy query, which only supports the `host` field.
If it is enabled, the length of `Value` must be 1.

`createTime`: Domain name creation time
`certExpireTime`: Certificate expiration time

members.document:
List of resources to be pre-warmed, for example:
http://www.example.com/example.txt
members.name: Targets

members.document:
Specifies whether to encode the URL
Note that if it’s enabled, the purging is based on the converted URLs.
members.name: EncodeUrl

members.document:
List of failed tasks
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: FailedList

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document:
Type of the purging task. Values:
- `purge_url`: Purge by the URL
- `purge_prefix`: Purge by the prefix
- `purge_host`: Purge by the Hostname
- `purge_all`: Purge all cached contents
members.name: Type

members.document:
Target resource to be purged, which depends on the `Type` field.
1. When `Type = purge_host`:
Hostnames are purged, such as www.example.com and foo.bar.example.com.
2. When `Type = purge_prefix`:
Prefixes are purged, such as http://www.example.com/example.
3. When `Type = purge_url`:
URLs are purged, such as https://www.example.com/example.jpg.
4. When `Type = purge_all`: All types of resources are purged.
`Targets` is not a required field.
members.name: Targets

members.document:
Specifies whether to transcode non-ASCII URLs according to RFC3986.
Note that if it’s enabled, the purging is based on the converted URLs.
members.name: EncodeUrl

members.document:
List of failed tasks and reasons
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: FailedList

DnsDataFilter.document: Ignore query string parameters for DNS data

members.document:
Parameter name. Valid values:
`zone`: Site name
`host`: Domain name
`type`: DNS resolution type
`code`: DNS response code
`area`: Region of the resolution server
members.name: Name

members.document:
Parameter value
When `Name=area`, valid values:
`Asia`
`Europe`
`Africa`
`Oceania`
`Americas`

When `Name=code`, valid values:
`NoError`: Successful response.
`NXDomain`: Non-existent domain in the request. It is only valid when the response is from the authoritative name server.
`NotImp`: Request type not supported.
`Refused`: The name server refuses to perform the requested operation for policy reasons.
members.name: Value

members.document:
Parameter value
When `Name=area`, valid values:
`Asia`
`Europe`
`Africa`
`Oceania`
`Americas`

When `Name=code`, valid values:
`NoError`: Successful response.
`NXDomain`: Non-existent domain in the request. It is only valid when the response is from the authoritative name server.
`NotImp`: Request type not supported.
`Refused`: The name server refuses to perform the requested operation for policy reasons.
members.name: Values

members.document:
Priority
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Priority

members.document:
CNAME address
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Cname

members.document:
Specifies whether to enable load balancing, layer-4 proxy, or security protection for the domain name.
- `lb`: Load balancing.
- `security`: Security protection.
- `l4`: Layer-4 proxy.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: DomainStatus

DnsRecordFilter.document: Query filter to search for DNS records

members.document:
Filters by the field name. Vaules:
- `name`: Site name.
- `status`: Site status.

members.document: Specifies whether to enable fuzzy query. It’s only available when the filter name is `name`. If it’s enabled, the length of `Values` must be 1.
members.name: Fuzzy

TLS version settings. Valid values: `TLSv1`, `TLSV1.1`, `TLSV1.2`, and `TLSv1.3`. Only consecutive versions can be enabled at the same time.

Schedules domain names
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Cname

members.document:
Specifies the max age of the cache (in seconds). The maximum value is 365 days.
Note: the value `0` means not to cache.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: MaxAgeTime

members.document:
Specifies whether to follow the max cache age of the origin server. Valid values: `on` and `off`. If it's on, `MaxAgeTime` is ignored.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: FollowOrigin

members.document: Session persistence time. Value range: 30-3600 (in seconds).
members.name: SessionPersistTime

members.document:
Specifies how a layer-4 proxy is created.
`hostname`: Subdomain name
`instance`: Instance
members.name: ProxyType

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document:
Port. Valid values:
`80`: Port 80
`81-90`: Port range 81-90
members.name: Port

members.document:
Origin server type. Valid values:
`custom`: Specified origins
`origins`: An origin group
`load_balancing`: A load balancer
members.name: OriginType

members.document:
Origin server information.
When `OriginType=custom`, this field value indicates multiple origin servers in either of the following formats:
IP:Port
Domain name: Port
When `OriginType=origins`, it indicates the origin group ID.
members.name: OriginValue

members.document:
Passes the client IP. When `Proto=TCP`, valid values:
`TOA`: Pass the client IP via TOA.
`PPV1`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V1.
`PPV2`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V2.
`OFF`: Do not pass the client IP.
When `Proto=UDP`, valid values:
`PPV2`: Pass the client IP via Proxy Protocol V2.
`OFF`: Do not pass the client IP.
members.name: ForwardClientIp

members.document: Specifies whether to enable session persistence
members.name: SessionPersist

members.document: Site ID, which is used to identify the site.

members.document:
Specifies how the site is connected to EdgeOne.
- `full`: Connect via the name server.
- `partial`: Connect via the CNAME.

members.document:
Site status.
- `pending`: The name server is not connected.
- `active`: The name server is connected.
- `moved`: The name server is moved.
members.name: Status

members.document:
Specifies how the site is connected to EdgeOne.
- `full`: Connect via the name server.
- `partial`: Connect via the CNAME.
members.name: Type

members.name: NameServers

- `finished`: Ownership of the site is verified.
- `pending`: Verifying the ownership of the site.

members.name: RequestId

members.document:
Whether to enable offline cache. Valid values: `on` and `off`.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Switch

members.document:
Origin-pull protocol.
`http`: Switch HTTPS requests to HTTP
`follow`: Follow the protocol of the request.
`https`: Switch HTTP requests to HTTPS. This only supports port 443 on the origin server.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: OriginPullProtocol

members.document:
Origin server type
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: OriginType

members.document:
Whether the origin group is used for layer-4 proxy
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: ApplicationProxyUsed

members.document:
Whether the origin group is used for load balancing
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: LoadBalancingUsed

members.document:
Region of the origin group. It’s available when the origin group `Type` is `area`. 
If it’s left empty, it means to use the default region.
members.name: Area

members.document: The weight of the origin group. It’s available when the `Type` is `weight`.
members.name: Weight

members.document:
Specifies whether to run private origin authentication.
It is valid only when `OriginType=third_part`.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Private

members.document:
Private origin parameter.
It is valid only when `Private=true`.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: PrivateParameter

members.document:
Name of the private origin authentication parameter.
`AccessKeyId`: Access key ID
`SecretAccessKey`: Secret access key
members.name: Name

members.document: Value of the private origin authentication parameter
members.name: Value

PostMaxSize.document: Maximum size of the file uploaded for streaming via a POST request

members.document:
Specifies whether to enable custom setting of the maximum file size. 
`off`: Disable. In this case, the max size defaults to 32 MB.
`on`: Enable. You can set a custom max size.
members.name: Switch

members.document:
Maximum size. Value range: 1-500 MB.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: MaxSize

members.document:
Whether to use `QueryString` as part of `CacheKey`. Valid values: `on` and `off`.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Switch

members.document:
`includeCustom`: Include the specified query strings.
`excludeCustom`: Exclude the specified query strings.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Action

members.document:
Array of query strings used/excluded
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Value

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Number of DNS records added after scanning
members.name: RecordsAdded

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document:
Server certificate ID, which is the ID of the default certificate. If you choose to upload an external certificate for SSL certificate management, a certificate ID will be generated.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: CertId

members.document:
Alias of the certificate
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Alias

members.document:
Certificate type.
`default`: Default certificate
`upload`: External certificate
`managed`: Tencent Cloud managed certificate
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Type

members.document:
Time when the certificate expires
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: ExpireTime

members.document:
Certificate deployment time
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: DeployTime

members.document:
Certificate deployment status.
`processing`: Deploying
`deployed`: Deployed
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: Status

members.document:
Whether to enable smart acceleration
`on`: Enable
`off`: Disable
members.name: Switch

members.document:
Whether to enable HTTP2 origin-pull
`on`: Enable
`off`: Disable
members.name: Switch

members.document:
Whether to enable the custom name server
`on`: Enable
`off`: Disable
members.name: Switch

VanityNameServersIps.document: IP of the custom name server

members.document: Name of the custom name server
members.name: Name

members.document: IPv4 address of the custom name server
members.name: IPv4

members.document: Whether to enable custom WebSocket timeout setting. When it’s `off`: it means to keep the default WebSocket connection timeout period, which is 15 seconds. To change the timeout period, please set it to `on`.
members.name: Switch

members.document: Sets timeout period in seconds. Maximum value: 120
members.name: Timeout

members.document: List of name servers used by the site
members.name: OriginalNameServers

members.document: List of name servers assigned by Tencent Cloud
members.name: NameServers

members.document:
Site status
- `active`: The name server is switched.
- `pending`: The name server is not switched.
- `moved`: The name server is moved.
- `deactivated`: The name server is blocked.
members.name: Status

members.document:
How the site is connected to EdgeOne.
- `full`: The site is connected via name server.
- `partial`: The site is connected via CNAME.
members.name: Type

members.document: Indicates whether the site is disabled
members.name: Paused

members.document:
Ownership verification status of the site when it is connected to EdgeOne via CNAME.
- `finished`: The site is verified.
- `pending`: Verifying the ownership of the site.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value can be obtained.
members.name: CnameStatus

members.document:
Filters by the field name. Vaules:
- `name`: Site name.
- `status`: Site status.
members.name: Name

members.document: Specifies whether to enable fuzzy query. It’s only available when filter name is `name`. If it’s enabled, the length of `Values` must be 1.
members.name: Fuzzy
